Trigger.Name: 石化 关闭
Trigger.RegularExpression: \blose[s]? the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Shadoweye|ディレイスペル：シャドウアイ) from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15}\.$

Trigger.Name: 石化 倒计时
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 1A:[0-9a-fA-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z\-' ]{5,21}) gains the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Shadoweye|ディレイスペル：シャドウアイ) from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15} for (?<duration>[0-9\.]{4,5}) Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 火3
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 1A:[0-9a-fA-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z\-' ]{5,21}) gains the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Dark Fire III|ディレイスペル：ダークファイガ) from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15} for 9999\.00 Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 分摊 关闭
Trigger.RegularExpression: \blose[s]? the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Unholy Darkness|ディレイスペル：ダークホーリー) from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15}\.$

Trigger.Name: 分摊 倒计时
Trigger.RegularExpression: \bgains the effect of (Spell-In-Waiting: Unholy Darkness|ディレイスペル：ダークホーリー) from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15} for (?<duration>[0-9\.]+) Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 大海啸:直线:25
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 1A:[0-9a-fA-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z\-' ]{5,21}) gains the effect of (?<effect>Sundering) Waters from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15} for 25\.00 Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 大海啸:直线:8
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 1A:[0-9a-fA-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z\-' ]{5,21}) gains the effect of (?<effect>Sundering) Waters from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15} for 8\.00 Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 大海啸:直线:21
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 1A:[0-9a-fA-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z\-' ]{5,21}) gains the effect of (?<effect>Sundering) Waters from [A-Z]{0,1}[a-z]{0,15} for 21\.00 Seconds\.$

Trigger.Name: 十字跳
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[[0-9.:]{12}\] 14:411B:(Titan|タイタン) starts using Landslide on \1\.$
